April 21, 1924 D Australian Championships (A Grade)
Australian Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Australian Championships australian-championships-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
Set Test and Own Choice
I Masnadieri [unknown arranger]
Toowoomba, Queensland, Australia October 1923 in the Australasian Bandsman Journal A preliminary announcement the Queensland Band Championships to be held at Easter in Toowoomba next year (1924) During the contest newspaper reporting referred these championships as either the Championship of the Commonwealth or the Australian Band Championships
Latter evidence suggested the latter to be correct title
Feb. 8, 2016, 12:26 a.m. Oct. 22, 2018, 4:37 a.m.
